sx.blah.discord.handle.obj

Interface IRole

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDiscordObject<IRole>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Role

    public interface IRole
extends IDiscordObject<IRole>
    Represents a role.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeColor(Color color)
      Changes the color of the role.
      void changeHoist(boolean hoist)
      Changes whether to hoist the role.
      void changeMentionable(boolean isMentionable)
      Changes whether this role is mentionable.
      void changeName(String name)
      Changes the name of the role.

      Changes the permissions of the role.

      Attempts to delete this role.
      Color getColor()
      Gets the color for this role.
      IGuild getGuild()
      Gets the guild this role belongs to.
      String getName()
      Gets the name of the role.
      EnumSet<Permissions> getPermissions()
      Gets the position the role allows.
      int getPosition()
      Gets the position of the role, the higher the number the higher priority it has on sorting.
      boolean isDeleted()
      Checks to see if the this role is deleted.
      boolean isEveryoneRole()
      This checks if the role is the @everyone role.
      boolean isHoisted()
      Gets whether the role is hoisted–meaning that it is displayed separately from the @everyone role.
      boolean isManaged()
      Checks whether the role is managed by an external plugin like twitch.
      boolean isMentionable()
      Gets whether this role is mentionable or not.
      String mention()
      Formats a string to @mention the role.

      • Methods inherited from interface sx.blah.discord.handle.obj.IDiscordObject

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        int getPosition()
        Gets the position of the role, the higher the number the higher priority it has on sorting. @everyone is always -1
        Returns:
        The position.

      • getPermissions

        EnumSet<Permissions> getPermissions()
        Gets the position the role allows.
        Returns:
        The set of enabled permissions.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Gets the name of the role.
        Returns:
        The name.

      • isManaged

        boolean isManaged()
        Checks whether the role is managed by an external plugin like twitch.
        Returns:
        True if managed, false if otherwise.

      • isHoisted

        boolean isHoisted()
        Gets whether the role is hoisted–meaning that it is displayed separately from the @everyone role.
        Returns:
        True if hoisted, false if otherwise.

      • getColor

        Color getColor()
        Gets the color for this role.
        Returns:
        The color.

      • isMentionable

        boolean isMentionable()
        Gets whether this role is mentionable or not.
        Returns:
        True if mentionable, false if otherwise.

      • getGuild

        IGuild getGuild()
        Gets the guild this role belongs to.
        Returns:
        The guild.

     throws MissingPermissionsException,

      • isEveryoneRole

        boolean isEveryoneRole()
        This checks if the role is the @everyone role.
        Returns:
        True if the @everyone role, false if otherwise.

      • isDeleted

        boolean isDeleted()
        Checks to see if the this role is deleted.
        Returns:
        True if this role is deleted.

      • mention

        String mention()
        Formats a string to @mention the role.
        Returns:
        The formatted string. Note: if isMentionable() returns false, this just returns the result of getName().
